Name: Gin Berry
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Berry flavours combine harmoniously with gin - what an appropriate name.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2004 by Chris Lacey, UK.
Nutrition: One serving of Gin Berry contains 175 calories
